original: @193b 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa /
analyzed: @193b 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Mahākāla, Which Liberates from All Epidemics

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po /
analyzed: nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po /
translated: The great being Mahākāla, with a black and yellow face and sharp fangs,

original: mche ba chen po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: mche ba chen po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: the one who liberates from all epidemics, should be expressed.

original: phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig //🔽tadya th'a / ha na ha na r'a dza dhu te na /🔽da ha da ha r'a @194a *//
analyzed: phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig // tadya th'a / ha na ha na r'a dza dhu te na / da ha da ha r'a @194a *//
translated: In whatever direction one looks, may one be free from epidemics.🔽Tadyathā: hana hana rāja dhūte na

original: dza dhu te na /
analyzed: dza dhu te na /

original: pa tsa pa tsa r'a dza dhu te na /🔽ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri b'a re /
analyzed: pa tsa pa tsa r'a dza dhu te na / ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri b'a re /
translated: paca paca rāja dhūte na🔽vahu śrave vaha parivāra
